name: Verification

testSteps.description: 1: Verification ({accesionNumber=20210000000002249, testType=HIV INFANT VIRAL LOAD(Serum), panelType=Bilan Biochimique, unitType=Molecular Biology})

children.description: Given User goes to Home page
When User Goes to Patient Status Report Page
And User Generates Patient Status Report for the accession number "20210000000002249"
Then Saved results without rejection reason appear on Patient Status Report
When User Goes to Workplan --> By Test Type
Then Retest tests appear on workplan for that accession number By Test Type "HIV INFANT VIRAL LOAD(Serum)"
When User Goes to Workplan --> By Panel Type
Then Retest tests appear on workplan for that accession number By Panel Type "Bilan Biochimique"
When User Goes to Workplan --> By Unit
Then Retest tests appear on workplan for that accession number By Unit Type "Molecular Biology"

title: Verification

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
When User Goes to Patient Status Report Page
And User Generates Patient Status Report for the accession number "<accesionNumber>"
Then Saved results without rejection reason appear on Patient Status Report
When User Goes to Workplan --> By Test Type
Then Retest tests appear on workplan for that accession number By Test Type "<testType>"
When User Goes to Workplan --> By Panel Type
Then Retest tests appear on workplan for that accession number By Panel Type "<panelType>"
When User Goes to Workplan --> By Unit
Then Retest tests appear on workplan for that accession number By Unit Type "<unitType>"
